:py:mod:`robotlibrary.infrared`
===============================

.. py:module:: robotlibrary.infrared


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   robotlibrary.infrared.IR




.. py:class:: IR(pinNo, robot)


   This class manages the IR-sensor. Write your code in Robot.ir_detected()

   .. py:method:: reset_detected(t)


   .. py:method:: obstacle(pin)

      This is called on any change in the IR-sensor.
